original_text: You shall stone him to death with stones, because he sought to draw you away from the Lord your God, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slavery.
korean_text: 그는 애굽 땅 종 되었던 집에서 너를 인도하여 내신 네 하나님 여호와에게서 너를 꾀어 떠나게 하려 한 자이니 너는 돌로 쳐죽이라

sentences.original_text: You shall stone him to death with stones
because he sought to draw you away
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 너를 꾀어내려고 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: who brought you out of the land of Egypt
out of the house of slavery
